#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll power(ll a,ll b)
{
	ll ans=1;
	while(b)
	{
		if(b&1)
		{
			b-=1;
			ans*=a;
			if(ans>=mod)
			ans%=mod;
		}
		b/=2;
		a*=a;
		if(a>=mod)
		a%=mod;
		
		
	}
	return ans;
}
int main()
{
	ll n;
	cin>>n;
	ll sum1=1;
	ll sum2=1;
	ll sum3=1;
	if(n==0) 
	cout<<0<<endl;
	for(ll i=0;i<2*n;i++)
	{
		if(i<n)
		{
		
			sum2=sum2*(i+1);
			if(sum2>=mod)
			sum2%=mod;
		}
		sum1=sum1*(i+1);
		if(sum1>=mod)
		sum1%=mod;
		
	}
	sum2*=sum2;
	if(sum2>=mod)
	sum2%=mod;
	sum2*=(n+1);
	if(sum2>=mod)
	sum2%=mod;
	ll ans=sum1*power(sum2,mod-2);
	if(ans>=mod)
	ans%=mod;
	cout<<ans<<endl;
	
}
